Name: Granada Luxury Okurcalar
Description: Located by the coast close to the small town of Okurcular, this impressive hotel lies between the resorts of Side and Alanya. This hotel is located 90km to Antalya airport, 30km to Alanya city center and 30km to Side Antique City. This hotel offers air-conditioned guest rooms decorated in sparkling designs, equipped with central heating/cooling, 32" LCD TV, minibar, safe and en-suite bathroom with bath amenities. This large and modern hotel is suitable for families and couples with a range of recreational activities, guests can relax at a spectacular decked jetty which arcs 180 degrees over the sea and is a great place to lie back and enjoy the sun while kids can enjoy at the mini club with children animation or have fun at the children pool both indoor and outdoor. Guests can also enjoy all local drinks alcohol and non-alcohol; some import drinks are available at the bar or dine at the on-site restaurant serving Turkish and International food.

Facilities.Name: All inclusive with alcoholic drinks own brands
